remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于启用创建完全支持数据绑定、 更改通知、 属性失效和其内容的动画的自定义集合类型。This class is provided to enable the creation of custom collection types that fully support data binding, change notification, property invalidation, and animation of its contents. ### FreezableCollection 的 XAML 用法XAML Usage for FreezableCollection 支持有限[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法。 supports a limited [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. - 作为根处的对象元素，您可以从理论上讲指定不受约束对象元素，它还必须指定[X:typearguments 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)声明约束。As an object element at the root, you can theoretically specify an unconstrained object element, which must also specify the [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) to declare the constraint. 但是，这是不常见的方案中，因为为此，必须是根元素。However, this is not a common scenario, because to do this, the must be the root element. 之所以存在此限制，因为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中的处理器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]仅支持[X:typearguments 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)时设置的元素是根元素，并且你必须使用任何打开如果你想要实例化中的泛型类型约束泛型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This limitation exists because the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can only support [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) when the element it is being set on is the root element, and you must use on any open constraint generic if you want to instantiate a generic type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 不太可能要作为根元素，即使是作为松散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。It is unlikely that you want a as the root element, even as loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. - 如果派生自并应用派生的集合中的类型约束，派生的集合可以支持多种用法。If you derive from and apply a type constraint in the derived collection, the derived collection can support a variety of usages. 这可能是因为你派生中的约束不需要传递。This is possible because the constraint in your derivation eliminates the need to pass . - 典型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]此类派生的集合的用法是通过隐式集合语法。The typical [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage for such a derived collection is through implicit collection syntax. 支持某些接口的集合不需要指定对象元素本身的集合。Collections that support certain interfaces do not need to specify the collection itself as an object element. 有关详细信息中的集合语法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For details on collection syntax in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 例如，*对象*与*属性*其中*属性*的类型为受约束无法支持以下语法：For instance, an *object* with a *property* where the *property* was of type constrained by could support the following syntax: ``` ``` - 只要你不要隐藏默认构造函数，派生的集合还可以支持对象元素语法 （其中的对象元素是显式的而不是上面所示的隐式使用情况）。As long as you do not hide the default constructor, the derived collection can also support an object element syntax (where the object element is explicit, as opposed to the implicit usage shown above). 它不必是根元素。It does not need to be the root element. 或者，你还可以使用派生的集合的根元素，而无需指定，尽管使用的根元素的集合不常见。Or, you can also use the derived collection as a root element, without needing to specify , although using a collection as a root element is uncommon. - 在上述方案集合的任何子元素必须实现的约束的或由指定的类型。Any child elements of the collection in either of the above scenarios must be of the type of either the implemented constraint, or as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作对指定的集合; 执行的浅表副本仅复制对集合的元素的引用，则将不会克隆元素本身。This operation performs a shallow copy on the specified collection; only references to the collection's elements are copied, the elements themselves are not cloned. 修改的新元素还会修改该元素`collection`。Modifying an element of the new also modifies that element for `collection`. 元素将被放置在新与指定集合的枚举器读取这些相同的顺序。The elements are placed in the new in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the specified collection.
